name: Manectric
description: The Discharge Pokémon. Manectric is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this Pokémon creates thunderclouds.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: If this Pokemon or an ally within 30 feet is targeted with a direct electric-type, damage-dealing move, the Pokemon may use a reaction to redirect the target to itself and take half damage from it if it hits.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: This Pokémon boosts its attack and damage rolls by 2 if an ally also has a Plus or Minus ability
